id.description: Unique ID of the person record

created_at.description: Date and time when the person record was created

updated_at.description: Date and time when the person record was last updated

last_contacted_at.description: Date and time when the person was last contacted

last_replied_at.description: Date and time when the person last replied to an email

full_email_address.description: Full email address of the person

secondary_email_address.description: Secondary email address of the person

personal_email_address.description: Personal email address of the person

phone_extension.description: Extension for the person's phone number

home_phone.description: Home phone number of the person

mobile_phone.description: Mobile phone number of the person

linkedin_url.description: LinkedIn profile URL of the person

city.description: City where the person is located

state.description: State/Province where the person is located

country.description: Country where the person is located

crm_url.description: URL to access the person's record in the CRM

crm_id.description: ID of the person in the CRM system

crm_object_type.description: Type of object in the CRM associated with the person

owner_crm_id.description: CRM ID of the person's owner

person_company_name.description: Name of the person’s associated company

person_company_website.description: Website of the person’s associated company

person_company_industry.description: Industry of the person’s associated company

do_not_contact.description: Boolean indicating if the person should not be contacted

bouncing.description: Boolean indicating if emails to this person are bouncing

personal_website.description: Personal website URL of the person

last_contacted_type.description: Type of last contact with the person

job_seniority.description: Seniority level of the person's job

custom_fields.description: Custom fields associated with the person

contact_restrictions.description: List of contact restrictions for the person

counts.description: Various count metrics related to the person

emails_sent.description: Number of emails sent to this person

emails_viewed.description: Number of emails viewed by this person

emails_clicked.description: Number of emails clicked by this person

emails_replied_to.description: Number of emails replied to by this person

emails_bounced.description: Number of emails bounced for this person

calls.description: Number of calls made to this person

account.description: Information related to the account associated with the person

owner.description: Information about the owner (user) of this person's record

last_contacted_by.description: Information about the last person who contacted this person

_href.description: Link to the last contacted by resource

id.description: ID of the last contacted by person

import.description: Information related to the import of the person data

person_stage.description: Stage of the person in the sales process

_href.description: Link to the person stage resource

most_recent_cadence.description: Information about the most recent cadence associated with the person

_href.description: Link to the most recent cadence resource

id.description: ID of the most recent cadence

last_completed_step_cadence.description: Information about the last completed step's cadence

_href.description: Link to the last completed step cadence resource

id.description: ID of the last completed step cadence

last_completed_step.description: Information about the last completed step in a sequence

_href.description: Link to the last completed step resource

id.description: ID of the last completed step
